backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing certificate IDs in a map with methods to verify, add, and remove certificates, trapping on duplicates or missing entries.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report describing a feature update to replace placeholder social links with real URLs and listing affected frontend files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files including pages, components, data modules, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting SEO metadata, icons, and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, global layout, theming, and query client with header and footer wrappers.
frontend/src/components/HeroCodeLines.ts: Decorative component rendering animated cyber-themed code lines over the hero section.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer showing brand info, navigation, legal links, and social icons using updated URLs for major platforms.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive site header with logo, navigation links, and mobile menu toggle using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/TextImageCarouse: Interactive text-image carousel with autoplay, keyboard navigation, and reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/data/articles.ts: Defines Article type and exports a list of article entries with metadata and full content.
frontend/src/data/courses.ts: Defines Course type and provides a catalog of cybersecurity courses with details and pricing.
frontend/src/data/galleryImages.ts: Exports categorized image metadata for use in gallery and UI displays.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook that detects the user's reduced‑motion preference via a media query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark cybersecurity themes and custom UI component styling.
frontend/src/lib/currency.ts: Provides a helper to format numbers as INR currency using Intl.NumberFormat.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Contains simple required-field and email format validation functions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with values, testimonials, and a carousel highlighting the organization’s mission and story.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Displays a full article based on slug, including image, metadata, and formatted content.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Lists all articles in a card grid with previews and navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/CertificateVerificati: Allows users to enter a certificate ID and verifies it through an actor with loading and result states.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, localStorage submission, and social links.
frontend/src/pages/CourseDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed course info including description, image, pricing, and metadata, with navigation back to the courses list.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Displays a grid of course cards with images, details, prices, and navigation to individual course pages.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Renders a gallery grid of images with hover effects and category labels.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with a hero section, featured courses, tool categories, and a rotating content carousel.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Shows the site's privacy policy using structured card sections for key policy points.
frontend/src/pages/ResourcesPage.tsx: Lists categorized cybersecurity resources with icons and itemized content plus a responsible-use notice.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Presents the terms and conditions in card-based sections detailing usage, rights, and responsibilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS themes, colors, container settings, and custom animations for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, architecture notes, image generation records, and existing feature definitions for the ICP dapp scaffold.
